name: ORCHID - UI Kit / Design System
description:
This design system will help you to design your dashboard using the Orchid software library.


Cogenio asked me to design this library for his personal projects and to put it online for the community. 


This library has been designed using responsive principle by including styles, components and variants.


The following elements are included:

  • Colors
  • Fonts
  • Forms
  • Layouts
  • Navigation components


Do not hesitate to give me your feedback and suggest improvements.
